mapper.insert: insert into memnotice(MEM_NOTICE_NUM, MEM_NOITCE_SUB, MEM_NOITCE_CONTENT, MEM_NOICE_FILE, MEM_NOICE_DATE, ADMINS_NUM) values(memNotice_seq.nextval, #{noticeSub}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeFile}, sysdate, #{adminsNum})
mapper.select: select MEM_NOTICE_NUM noticeNum, MEM_NOITCE_SUB noticeSub, MEM_NOITCE_CONTENT noticeContent, MEM_NOICE_FILE noticeFile, MEM_NOICE_DATE noticeDate, ADMINS_NUM adminsNum from memnotice
select CEO_NOTICE_NUM noticeNum, CEO_NOTICE_SUB noticeSub, CEO_NOTICE_CONTENT noticeContent, CEO_NOTICE_FILE noticeFile, CEO_NOTICE_DATE noticeDate, ADMINS_NUM adminsNum from ceonotice
